page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: OURS IS A RURAL AREA. WE HAVE TWO RIVERS, THE{RIVER RODEN}AND THE{RIVER {TERN.}THEY JOIN TOGETHER BY MILL HOUSE FARM AT WALCOT. THERE IS A LAKE CALLED THE{MIRELAKE}AND BY IT THERE IS A FARM. THERE ARE TWO VILLAGES,{RODINGTON}AND {WITHINGTON. }RODINGTON VILLAGE IS BIGGER THAN WITHINGTON VILLAGE. THIS IS WHERE MOST OF THE POPULATION OF THIS AREA IS TO BE FOUND. THERE ARE SEVERAL FARMS AND A FEW SCATTERED HOUSES AND COTTAGES. THERE ARE NO MAIN{ROADS,}ONLY COUNTRY LANES, WHICH ARE LESS THAN 4 METERS WIDE. THEY ARE VERY BENDY WITH LOTS OF BAD CORNERS. THE{LANDSCAPE}IS FAIRLY FLAT WITH LOTS OF FIELDS AND ONLY THREE SMALL AREAS OF WOODLAND, BUT THERE ARE ALSO ISOLATED TREES AND COPSES.
